meanings.definition: To replace the roof of a building.
meanings.sent1: We need to reroof our house before the rainy season.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers will reroof the old building next week.
meanings.sent3: After the storm, the neighbors joked that they should reroof their house with umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sunny day after they reroofed the school building.
meanings.sent5: The decision to reroof the cabin brought a sense of renewal to the entire property.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing the roof of a building.
meanings.sent1: The reroof of the church was completed just in time for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: A proper inspection is necessary before starting a reroof.
meanings.sent3: The reroof of the barn turned into a community event with everyone pitching in.
meanings.sent4: The reroof of the house was a symbol of the family's commitment to their home.
meanings.sent5: The new reroof brought a fresh look to the entire neighborhood.
